author: Ivan Mehta
title: Daily Distraction: Hola, learn a new language during this lockdown
description: If you were born in India like me, chances are that you speak more than a couple of languages at least. I can read, write, and speak three languages — Gujarati, Hindi, and English — fluently. Plus, I can understand and speak a couple of others partially. Howe…
content:
If you were born in India like me, chances are that you speak more than a couple of languages at least. I can read, write, and speak three languages Gujarati, Hindi, and English fluently. Plus, I can understand and speak a couple of others partially.
